subtitle: Haddock rings with a tasty oaty stuffing.

method.text: Peel and core the apples. Cut into chunks approximately 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>4</sub> cm square.
Add the apple to a pan with the water. Cook for approximately 5 min or until apple has softened but still fairly firm and there is little water left. Remove from the heat.
Stir the oats, lemon rind and juice into the pan. Add the horseradish. Add enough of the melted butter to bind to a well mixed but not sticky stuffing. Season to taste.
Fold each halved haddock fillet into a round to make a 'ring'. Carefully secure with a cocktail stick.
Arrange in a lightly greased ovenproof dish. Divide the stuffing mixture between each ring.
Brush the tops of the stuffed fillets with any remaining butter. Cook in the oven for 15-20 min or until stuffing has browned a little.
Serve immediately on warmed serving plates.

title: Smoked haddock stuffed with apple and horseradish
